name: IKATRUGA
description:
IKATRUGA

Endless runner type game, took Tappi Bear Space Rush and Ikaruga and put them together!

Made for the Summer Slow Jam July 2019, WIP not yet submitted.

Instructions:

Dodge debris or run into same colored debris! Survive!

On Screen Controls:

Just click on the buttons!

Keyboard Controls:

Left/Right - Move your character

Up - Change color
